Controls

You have two ways of controlling the 3D nebula set-up:

  1. Use the Control Panel that manages all the nodes and particle systems:

  2. Use the shader Nodes directly in the files to control the shape of the nebula, and the Nebula Box Object’s Particle System settings settings to control the stars and lighting:
